channel.title: Brosaen Pistons Podcast
channel.description: A podcast discussing the Detroit Pistons.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Brosaen Pistons Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Alex and Karl Rosaen
channel.itunes:summary: A couple of Michigan native Detroit Piston die hard fans discussing the Detroit Pistons.

item.title: 1: A Joe Dumars Retrospective
item.author: thoughtbot
item.description: From RailsConf, Ben talks to Chris Hunt of Github about techniques for enhancing spacial memory, competitive personalities, the coffee infamy of the Pacific Northwest and Clojure testing.
item.content:encoded:
From RailsConf, Ben talks to Chris Hunt of Github about techniques for enhancing spacial memory, competitive personalities, the coffee infamy of the Pacific Northwest and Clojure testing.

  • Dominic O'Brien Bibliography
  • World Memory Championships
  • Chris on Twitter
